patch:
diff --git a/src/H5VLcallback.c b/src/H5VLcallback.c
index 58e839c998..6ac8d0f7c4 100644
--- a/src/H5VLcallback.c
+++ b/src/H5VLcallback.c
@@ -5099,6 +5099,11 @@ H5VL_link_move(const H5VL_object_t *src_vol_obj, const H5VL_loc_params_t *loc_pa
     herr_t               ret_value       = SUCCEED; /* Return value */
 
     FUNC_ENTER_NOAPI(FAIL)
+// FIXME: Crash CWE-476: NULL Pointer Dereference
+ 
+    /* Validate input parameters */
+    if (!src_vol_obj || !loc_params1 || !loc_params2)
+        HGOTO_ERROR(H5E_ARGS, H5E_BADVALUE, FAIL, "invalid parameter");
 
     /* Set wrapper info in API context */
     vol_obj = (src_vol_obj->data ? src_vol_obj : dst_vol_obj);
@@ -5111,8 +5116,7 @@ H5VL_link_move(const H5VL_object_t *src_vol_obj, const H5VL_loc_params_t *loc_pa
                         vol_obj->connector->cls, lcpl_id, lapl_id, dxpl_id, req) < 0)
         HGOTO_ERROR(H5E_VOL, H5E_CANTMOVE, FAIL, "link move failed");
 
-done:
-    /* Reset object wrapping info in API context */
+done:    /* Reset object wrapping info in API context */
     if (vol_wrapper_set && H5VL_reset_vol_wrapper() < 0)
         HDONE_ERROR(H5E_VOL, H5E_CANTRESET, FAIL, "can't reset VOL wrapper info");
